Task-1_key3:
Ek List or Array har ek value ki ek position hoti jiske through hume pata chalta ha ki konsi value konse position meh hai ish position of index kehte hai.
a = [1,2,3,1,4,5] yeh List hai jahan ab hum agar likhe a[1] toh yeh 2 dega.
Task-1_key4: Ek List ki indexing 0 se start hoti hai aur ushme jitne elements hote ushe 1 kaam tak chalti hai.
Task-1_key5:
Indexing String meh bi hoti hai.
a = 'something' jahan agar app a[1] toh yeh apko o dega.
Task-1_key7: 2 String ko johrne ko String Concatination kehte hai.
Task-1_key9: Apko ek string di jayegi jahan apko string ke phele 2 aur akhir ke 2 letters print karwana hai lekin agar woh string meh 2 se kaam letters hai toh kuch bi nhi print hoga.
Task-1_key11: Apne program ko test karne ke liye ish input ko dale ke uske output check kare
